main event: A round white light was observed in the sky moving straight across from south to north at a constant speed.
interesting points: The object had an intense white glow and emitted no sound.,The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes.,The observer reported this as the second sighting of such an object.,The observer believes the object is of an unknown origin and not man-made aircraft.,The sighting occurred at night at 2300 hours.
sighted object: a round white light in the sky
witness description: civilian, age 25, presumed to be a physicist
